Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in D minor, HWV 437

c. 1703–1706

[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 12' 30"

  • 1. Prélude
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Sarabande
  • 5. Gigue

Some sources include after the gigue the sonatina in D minor (HWV 581).

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/5 · BA 4065 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4221 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Henle · HN 472 · Klaviersuiten und Klavierstücke (London 1733) · ed. Ellwood Derr
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50118a · Klavierwerke I, Teil a · ed. Peter Williams

1. Prélude

Some sources omit this prelude from the suite. The prelude, which is identical to the prélude in D minor (HWV 561), is an earlier version of the prélude to the suite in D minor (HWV 428).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Allemande

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Courante

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Sarabande

The sarabande is followed by two variations.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 1.5

5. Gigue

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5
